ComicInfo.Summary: They say it takes a thief to catch a thief, and the glamorous field agents of Victoria's Secret Service put this tenant to the test when they allow their newest member, the American sneak-thief Scarlet, to take point on her first full mission. Hoping to derail an imminent coronation, it seems that an unknown scoundrel has stolen the Crown Jewels from the Tower of London! It's up to Lark, Raven, Brooke, and Scarlet to steal back these vibrant symbols of the monarchy they have sworn to protect. But which of her teammates is spying on Scarlet? And why? It's thief versus thief and spy versus spy in this high-impact thriller.
